articles.title: DPRK State Tourism Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK State Tourism Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State General Bureau of Tourism headed by its Director Kim To Jun left here for China on Monday.
					 Arriving here on the same day was a delegation of cadres of the Communist Party of China led by Wang Wei, vice-minister of Supervision of China who doubles as member of the Standing Committee of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC.

articles.title: Fine Art Exhibition Celebrates Golden Jubilee of Mansudae Art Studio
articles.content:
Fine Art Exhibition Celebrates Golden Jubilee of Mansudae Art Studio
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A fine art exhibition was opened to mark the golden jubilee of the Mansudae Art Studio.
					 Displayed there are more than 500 art pieces produced by artists there on the occasion. 
					
					 Among them are Korean painting "Leader among Frontrankers of Chollima Movement", oil painting "Torch Lit by Leader Kim Jong Il in Kangson in December" and other works dealing with the personalities of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu as great persons and their immortal exploits.
					
					 Also displayed there are Korean painting "Trailblazers on Taegye Island", oil painting "Wonsan Saltern in Evening", calligraphy "Reaching Level of Ultra-Modern Science and Technology" and others truthfully depicting the breath of the times and the working people all out to build a thriving nation and their life.
					
					 Among the exhibits are art works of diverse themes and varieties including ceramic works, embroideries, gem-powdered Korean paintings, woodcuts and various kinds of designs.
					
					 Its opening ceremony was held on Monday.

articles.title: Mansudae Art Studio Greets Its 50 Birthday
articles.content:
Mansudae Art Studio Greets Its 50 Birthday
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Studio greets its 50th birthday on November 17.
					It is a modern and comprehensive base for creating all kinds of art. It has not only creative groups but also units for producing and supplying art equipment and materials.
					
					It is unthinkable apart from the wise guidance of the peerlessly great men that the studio has registered a brilliant development over the last five decades.
					
					President Kim Il Sung saw to it that the sculpture studio, the predecessor of the Mansudae Art Studio, was formed in the historical postwar period when the flame of the great Chollima upsurge flared up and the Statue of Chollima was erected as a monument reflecting the spirit of heroic Korea. After that, he had visited the studio on several occasions to clearly indicate the orientation and ways for building monumental edifices of the times.
					
					The President put forth the Juche-oriented ideas on fine-art and led the efforts to effloresce the Korean fine-art as the popular and revolutionary one, national in form and socialist in content. His exploits will shine long in the history of the Juche-oriented fine-art.
					
					Today the Korean fine-art is in a new heyday of its development under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					He advanced the idea and theory on describing the leader of the working class, the first of its kind in the history of humankind, and gave minute guidance to the efforts for holding the eternal image of the President in high esteem.
					
					Over the last period, the studio has created portraits, statues and other art pieces carrying the images of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu on a highest level and constructed the Samjiyon Grand Monument, Party Founding Memorial Tower and other grand edifices of the times. It has also produced the Korean painting "Bloody Battles against Japanese Imperialists", large-sized Korean paintings "1994, Tearful Year", "Red Sky Over Lake Chon of Mt. Paektu" and "Mt. Chilbo in Fall" and other works of national treasure and Korean-style jewel pictures.
					
					The studio has also made great successes in the creation of Korean painting, the pride of Korean fine-art, and oil painting, graphic painting, mural painting, embroidery and ceramic work.
					
					The Mansudae Art Studio with a powerful creative force comprising competent People's Artists and Merited Artists is demonstrating fully to the world the Juche-oriented fine-art in the Songun era.

articles.title: Kimchi-Making for Winter in Full Swing
articles.content:
Kimchi-Making for Winter in Full Swing
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Kimchi-making for winter has begun in the DPRK.
					When November comes, the Korean people prepare kimchi for winter with care as "a big family event", calling it "food for half a year".
					
					These days lorries loaded with radishes and vegetables can be seen in thoroughfares.
					
					Neighbors are promoting harmonious relations with each other, carrying and cleaning others' vegetables. 
					
					Housewives are putting their heart and soul into making watery radish kimchi and vegetable kimchi hotly flavored with spices for the purpose of sharing them with neighbors and winning the top place in the neighborhood unit kimchi show.
					
					What can merit commendation is the skillful hand of the women who are making delicious-looking whole cabbage kimchi, hot pickles of chopped radishes, sliced vegetable kimchi seasoned with pepper and others.
					
					This conspicuous scene can be seen only in Korea where priority is given to the people and the national ways are encouraged.

articles.title: Piffle of Commander of U.S. Forces in S. Korea Blasted
articles.content:
Piffle of Commander of U.S. Forces in S. Korea Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Walter Sharp, commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea, was recently reported to have underscored the need to keep the "UN Command" in the future, too, claiming it is an "effective mechanism" to eliminate the "factor of conflict" from the Asia-Pacific region and it will "protect" the Korean Peninsula from "hostile actions."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. may try to hype the importance of the existence of the ghostlike "UN Command" in a bid to justify the presence of its forces in south Korea and increase its influence in Northeast Asia, it can never cover up its injustice and illegality. 
					
					 What the U.S. has done under the signboard of the "UN Command" is nothing but its increase of the threat to the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the danger of war there.
					
					 It is a strategic mistake and anachronistic daydream for the U.S. to work hard to realize its strategy for invading the DPRK and its wild ambition for dominating Asia by bolstering up its forces in south Korea, a leftover of the Cold War, and using them as a shock brigade.
					
					 No matter how noisily the U.S. bellicose forces may trumpet about the elimination of the "factor of conflict", "protection" and "effective mechanism" in an effort to justify the existence of the illegal "UN Command" no one will lend an ear to such spate of rhetoric.
					
					 There is no legal ground for the U.S. forces to stay in south Korea in the light of the resolution of the 30th UN General Assembly which calls for dissolving the "UN Command" and withdrawing all foreign troops from south Korea and other documents.
					
					 If the U.S. truly has a will to prevent war on the Korean Peninsula and ensure peace in Northeast Asia, it should disband as early as possible the "UN Command", which is recognized by none and has no justification to exist, and take a bold action to pull its forces out of south Korea.

articles.title: Songun Politics Lauded
articles.content:
Songun Politics Lauded 
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- 11 political parties of Latin American countries which participated in the 12th Congress of the Brazilian Communist Party released a joint statement on Nov. 5 to mark the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il has pursued the original Songun political mode on a full scale by developing in depth the idea and line of attaching importance to the army and military affairs, set forth by President Kim Il Sung, on the basis of the scientific analysis into the international environment and the trend of changed situation with which the DPRK is faced.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 Under the Songun politics, the DPRK has contained the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' offensive to stifle it with its powerful military deterrent, thus defending socialism and demonstrating the sovereignty and dignity of the nation to the whole world.
					
					 Today the DPRK is displaying its sovereignty and dignity to the whole world, facing down the U.S. which threatens and discomforts the whole world. This reality makes the world more keenly feel that Songun is an invincible banner for the cause of independence.
					
					 Convinced that the Songun politics serves as a basic guarantee for making history of sure victory in the struggle against imperialism, we extend full support and solidarity to the DPRK's Songun politics.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported in Paraguay
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported in Paraguay
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Pedro Bonifacio Espinoza, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Paraguay, released a statement on November 6 in the lead up to one year since General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Chollima Steel Complex during which he kindled a torch of a new great revolutionary surge.
					 The statement recalled that Kim Jong Il, while visiting the complex on December 24 last year, said when Kangson, the cradle of the Chollima movement, seethes with activities, the whole country gets brisk with activities and when the workers of Kangson dash ahead, effecting innovations, it will hasten the advance of the workers throughout the country. He thus called upon the complex to raise high the torch of a new great revolutionary surge, it added.
					
					 The above-said torch lit in Kangson is raging throughout the DPRK, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 When the Korean people advance in this spirit, they will certainly fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, as they determined. 
					
					 Convinced that December 24 when the torch of a new great revolutionary surge was kindled would be recorded in the history of socialist Korea and remembered by the world progressive people as another significant day, the Communist Party of Paraguay expresses support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Authorities' Armed Provocation Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Authorities' Armed Provocation Flailed
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Nov. 10 in denunciation of the grave armed provocation perpetrated by the south Korean forces in the waters of the north side in the West Sea of Korea.
					 The statement vehemently denounced the south Korean military authorities for committing such armed provocation as challenging independence and peace in violation of the agreement between the north and the south.
					
					 Terming the above-said provocation a challenge to Songun Korea, the statement urged the south Korean authorities to immediately stop such military action against the DPRK and apologize for it. 
					
					But for the Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the DPRK's nuclear deterrent, another war would have been ignited on the Korean Peninsula by the south Korean puppet clique and the U.S. imperialists, noted the statement.
					
					 It called upon all the followers of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, to unite close around the DPRK, a bulwark of socialism.

articles.title: Chonggak Kimchi
articles.content:
Chonggak Kimchi
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- It was one day in November Juche 62 (1973).
					 President Kim Il Sung told with relish the origin of kimchi and how it was spread over the world and asked an official whether he had ever tasted chonggak kimchi.
					
					 As the official heard about chonggak kimchi for the first time, far from taking it, he could not answer his question. Fathoming his mind, the President urged him to make and have it.
					
					 The President said to the following effect: Chonggak kimchi originated in the northern areas centering on Pyongyang. It was called chonggak kimchi as it was made with young radishes. It is made by the method of salting radishes with leaves, seasoning them with various spices and pouring a little amount of soup over them. It can be said that chonggak kimchi is an original one along with tongchimi (watery radish kimchi).
					
					 Radish, he went on, could not grow fully in the northern areas because of cold climate in old times. People picked it up and pickled it for kimchi. It was so delicious that it was spread to the whole country. It is good to eat buckwheat noodle and other noodles with its soup.
					
					 Listening to him, the officials were surprised to know that he had richer knowledge on the long dietary tradition of the nation than experts had.

articles.title: Inaugurada galeria en homenaje al 50o aniversario de Casa de Creacion
articles.content:
Inaugurada galeria en homenaje al 50o aniversario de Casa de Creacion
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada este lunes la galeria en homenaje al 50o aniversario de la fundacion de la Casa de Creacion Mansudae.
					En la ocasion se ven casi 500 obras de los talentosos creadores presentadas con motivo de esa efemeride.
					
					Entre ellas figuran la pintura al estilo coreano "Junto con los precursores del movimiento de Chollima", la al oleo "Antorcha de diciembre encendida en la tierra de Kangson" y otras que transmiten las cualidades de gran hombre y las imborrables hazanas de los tres Generales del monte Paektu (el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente          Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa       Kim Jong Suk).
					
					Ademas, sobresalen la pintura al estilo coreano "Exploradores de la isla Taegye", la al oleo "Crepusculo de la Salina de Wonsan", la pieza caligrafica "Sobrepasando lo sofisticado" y otras que muestran el aliento de la epoca y describen de manera veridica la lucha y la vida de los trabajadores levantados para construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Y estan exhibidos ademas las obras ceramicas, el bordado, la pintura hecha con polvos de piedras preciosas de Corea, el grabado, los disenos y otras piezas de bellas artes de diversos generos y temas.

articles.title: Casa de Creacion Mansudae
articles.content:
Casa de Creacion Mansudae
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ATCC) -- La Casa de Creacion Mansudae de Corea celebra el 50o aniversario (17 de noviembre de 1959) de su fundacion, moderna base de creacion de bellas artes de gran envergadura que tiene los grupos de creacion y de fabricacion, que abarcan todos generos de bellas artes, y las unidades de produccion y suministracion de equipos y materiales de la rama.
					El desarrollo vertiginoso logrado por la Casa de Creacion durante los 50 anos pasados se debe enteramente a la destacada direccion de los grandes hombres sin par.
					
					En la historica epoca en que se avivaban furiosamente las llamas de gran auge de Chollima despues de posguerra, el Presidente Kim Il Sung formo el grupo de creacion de escultura, predecesora de la casa de creacion e hizo que este grupo irguiera la estatua de bronce de Chollima, simbolo del espiritu de Corea heroina, como maestra obra monumental. Luego visito en varias ocasiones esta casa para indicarle claramente la orientacion y los metodos para que construyan magnificamente las creaciones monumentales de la epoca.
					
					Brillan eternamente en la historia de bellas artes del Juche las hazanas del Presidente quien creo la idea en materia de construccion de bellas artes autoctonas e hizo que las bellas artes de Corea florezcan y se desarrollen como las populares y revolucionarias que combinen matices nacionales con el contenido socialista.
					
					Hoy en dia, bajo la direccion del Dirigente          Kim Jong Il las bellas artes del Juche acogen la era dorada de su desarrollo.
					
					El Dirigente creo por primera vez en la historia de la humanidad la idea y teoria sobre la descripcion del lider de la clase obrera y dio las detalladas instrucciones de describir mejor la imagen del Presidente
					
					En el pasado, la Casa de Creacion creo en maximo nivel los retratos, estatuas de bronce, obras de imagenes de los tres Generales del monte Paektu, construyo el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon, el Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido y otros grandes monumentales de la epoca y creo nuevamente la pintura al estilo coreano "Largo camino sanguineo antijapones", las de gran tamano "1994, ano lleno de sangres y lagrimas", "Crepusculo rojo del lago Chon del monte Paektu" y "Monte Chilbo en el otono" y otras obras de tesoro nacional y las pinturas coreanas con polvos de piedra preciosa a nuestro estilo.
					
					Y logro grandes exitos tambien en la creacion de pintura al estilo coreano que es el orgullo de bellas artes nacionales, pintura al oleo, dibujo editorial, pintura mural, bordado y porcelana.
					
					La Casa de Creacion Mansudae tiene las poderosas fuerzas de creacion incluyendo los Artistas del Pueblo y Benemeritos prestigiosos y manifiesta a todo el mundo el aspecto de bellas artes del Juche de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparate de Walter Sharp
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparate de Walter Sharp
						
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el comandante de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, Walter Sharp, dijo que "seguira existiendo en el futuro tambien" la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de las Naciones Unidas" diciendo que esta es una "organizacion eficiente" para eliminar los "factores de conflicto" en la region de Asia-Pacifico y "defendera" la Peninsula Coreana del supuesto "acto hostil".
					Aunque EE.UU. esta desesperado por dar destaque a ese fantasmal aparato militar con el intento de legalizar la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano por sus uniformados y ser mas influyente en la region del Nordeste Asiatico, no podra ocultar jamas lo injustificable e ilegal de su existencia.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					Lo unico que hizo el imperio por conducto de esa comandancia es haber amenazado la paz y la seguridad y aumentado el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Es un error estrategico y anacronica ilusion el intento de EE.UU. de mantener y fortalecer sus fuerzas armadas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, que son vestigio de la guerra fria, y realizar la estrategia agresiva a Corea y la ambicion de dominar a Asia usandolas como brigada de choque.
					
					Nadie hara caso de los disparates de las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas como la "eliminacion de factores de conflicto", la "defensa" y la "organizacion eficiente" para justificar la existencia de la ilegal "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de las Naciones Unidas".
					
					La resolucion aprobada en el 30o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, que exige la disolucion de ese aparato y la retirada de todos los uniformados extranjeros, y otras demuestran que las tropas norteamericanas carecen de la base legal para seguir estacionandose en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Si EE.UU. tiene de veras la voluntad de prevenir la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y asegurar la paz del Nordeste Asiatico, debera disolver inmediatamente esa ilegal e injustificable "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de las Naciones Unidas", que nadie reconoce, y tomar la valiente decision de evacuar a sus tropas del territorio surcoreano.

articles.title: Partidos politicos de America Latina apoyan la politica de Songun
articles.content:
Partidos politicos de America Latina apoyan la politica de Songun
  Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente       Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los 11 partidos politicos de los paises de America Latina participantes en el 12o congreso del Partido Comunista de Brasil publicaron el dia 5 una declaracion conjunta.
					  El documento indica que a base de analisis cientifico de las circunstancias internacionales en que se halla Corea y la tendencia de la situacion cambiada, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il profundizo la idea y la linea del Presidente Kim Il Sung de dar prioridad a las fuerzas armadas y los asuntos militares y practica globalmente el original modo de la politica de Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					Destaca que gracias a esta politica Corea defiende el socialismo y exalta a todo el mundo la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion contrarrestando con el potente disuasivo militar la ofensiva de aplastamiento a Corea de las fuerzas aliadas de los imperialistas acaudillados por Estados Unidos.
					
					  Apunta que hoy en dia, a traves de la realidad de Corea que manifiesta a todo el mundo su soberania y dignidad enfrentandose dignamente a EE.UU. que da amenaza e inquietud a todo el mundo, el orbe se siente profundamente de que el Songun es justamente la bandera invencible de la causa de la independencia.
					
					 Convencidos de que la politica de Songun es la garantia fundamental capaz de crear la historia de la invencibilidad en la lucha antiimperialista, brindamos a esta politica nuestro entero apoyo y solidaridad, concluye.
